name: Drosoph Hotel
description:
What Is Drosoph Hotel?
Drosoph Hotel is a simulator that allows you to become one of Ankou assistants and to personalize the most attractive hotel in order to protect the future of planet Earth.

Foresee the extinction of humanity due to the overpopulation of planet Earth by helping Ankou to fulfill his work. Scare and eliminate guests of this terrifying and complex hotel and recruit their souls to ensure the survival of humanity. Expand your hotel and defend yourself against the adversities that can arise while doing your work.Key Features
  • You’ll play as the Hotel manager with monsters and ghost as your allies
  • Build your own Hotel and scare your guests with many creepy powers
  • Play in Survival and Infinite Mode
  • Use your ghosts to remodel your rooms and scare your guests
  • Many different kind of strange deaths for unexpected traps
  • Zombies and monsters join together to defend your hotel
  • Make your own strategy to defend and survive the hunters
  • Make your own zombie army
  • Upgrade your underworld powers
  • Collect all the kind of ghosts
